Activity Web Page
Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.1.A.1.1

description.narrative: Number of females benefitting from diversified livelihoods opportunities through UNDP emergency projects

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.1.A.2.1

description.narrative: Number of males benefitting from diversified livelihoods opportunities through UNDP emergency projects

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.1.B.2.1

description.narrative: Number of new emergency jobs created for men 15+ years of age through UNDP projects in crisis or post-crisis settings

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.1.B.1.1

description.narrative: Number of new emergency jobs created for women 15+ years of age through UNDP projects in crisis or post-crisis settings

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.1.B.3.1

description.narrative: Total number of new emergency jobs created for adults 15+ years of age through UNDP projects in crisis or post-crisis settings

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.1.A.3.1

description.narrative: Total number of people benefitting from diversified livelihoods opportunities through UNDP emergency projects

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.2.1.A.2.1

description.narrative: Extent to which national and/or sub-national institutions have improved equipment and vehicles needed to lead and coordinate the early recovery process within 18 months of start of crisis and/or UNDP intervention

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.2.1.A.3.1

description.narrative: Extent to which national and/or sub-national institutions have improved human resources needed to lead and coordinate the early recovery processwithin 18 months of start of crisis and/or UNDP intervention

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.2.1.A.5.1

description.narrative: Extent to which national and/or sub-national institutions have improved institutional arrangements needed to lead and coordinate the early recovery process, within 18 months of start of crisis and/or UNDP intervention

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.2.1.A.4.1

description.narrative: Extent to which national and/or sub-national institutions have improved leadership skills needed to lead and coordinate the early recovery process, within 18 months of start of crisis and/or UNDP intervention

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.2.1.A.1.1

description.narrative: Extent to which national and/or sub-national institutions have improved physical infrastructure (buildings and facilities) needed to lead and coordinate the early recovery process within 18 months of start of crisis and/or UNDP intervention

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.2.2.A.1.1

description.narrative: Extent to which the centre of government has accountability mechanisms to hold institutions responsible for delivering their plans and finances

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.2.2.A.1.2

description.narrative: Extent to which the population is able to hold the relevant institutions responsible for delivering their plans through mechanisms such as open meetings, public accountability forums, etc.

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.2.2.A.2.1

description.narrative: Extent to which aid management system is owned and coordinated by the national government, and aligned with national systems and processes

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.2.A.1.1

description.narrative: Extent to which key actions for first critical benchmark have been identified

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.2.B.1.1

description.narrative: Extent to which key actions for second critical benchmark have been identified

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.2.C.1.1

description.narrative: Extent to which key actions for third critical benchmark have been identified

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.2.A.1.2

description.narrative: Extent to which specific actions for first critical benchmark were implemented

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.2.B.1.2

description.narrative: Extent to which specific actions for second critical benchmark were implemented

title.narrative: Output Indicator 6.1.2.C.1.2

description.narrative: Extent to which specific actions for third critical benchmark were implemented
